overview:
Walter Dubowec, whose career in developing loyalty, retention, new customer acquisition and traffic generation programs has spanned 30 years.

Walter has spoken at numerous loyalty marketing and incentive symposiums in New York, Toronto, Detroit, Montreal and Cincinnati. He is also the recipient of a prestigious CDMA marketing award.

Mr. Dubowec and his loyalty initiatives have been featured in Forbes, Premium & Incentive Magazine, The News & Observer, The Wise Marketer, ISO & Agent Weekly, The Green Sheet , Consumer Insight Loyalty Blog and The Sacramento Bee.

Walter began his career as the National Marketing Manager for the Hudson’s Bay Company, North America’s oldest retailer. Later, he was a consulting member of the original design team for Petro-Canada’s Petro-Points - Canada’s largest retail gas loyalty program.

Walter played a key role in creating the Bay & Zellers Card Dollars loyalty program for HBC and was a contributor to the highly acclaimed Club Z program. He was also was involved in the launch of coalition marketer, Consumer First.

Over the years, Walter has also worked with high profile companies like Sears, Kmart, RBC, Allstate, American Express, IBM, JC Penney, Simpsons, Household Finance Corporation, American Bankers Insurance Group and upscale retailer - Holt Renfrew.

Presently, Walter Dubowec is the creative and marketing force behind an innovative cloud-based closed loop loyalty and communications platform known as Firefly Rewards.
